column5: Just posted today on ESPN as well on Japanese television.  Looks to be a tie with George Perry's ancient record.  By the sight of it I cant really argue!!   http://sports.espn.go.com/outdoors/bassmas..._Japan_20090702
Oh no there goes Tokyo Go Go....um Bass
I love the comments on the YouTube link already...
Looks like a good lake to hit for big fish anyway
Can't be. The new record bass is going to come from Texas...... or California...... or Mexico........ or Cube. Clearly that bass can't read fishin' mags.
World record or not , if i catch something that ugly i'm cutting the line at the boat...  :wacko:
Its only a bass, MacNairs Muskie would still eat it and be looking for desert afterwords
LOL. like my bumper sticker says, "My undersized musky just ate your trophy bass" hahaha
really? mine says "what are muskie fisherman making up for?"

Why cant we all just get along lol. You guys are just to picky I will catch what ever bites my line!  Oh ya and that Bass is not ugly it is BEAUTIFUL then again I did kiss a sucker once on TV so what do I know?  See ya on the water  Dave

That bass reminds me of the big fat guy that had to have his wall broken down and taken away on a fork lift!!!  Caught on a live bluegill, wonder if its in its belly, hey it would give you an extra 6 ounces for the record!
its too bad a monster fish like that had to die.  sure is a big bass though  cheers!
So they not only make better cars they catch bigger bass.   What's next a gay French guy winning NASCAR.
I thought this was the record? Dotty the Bass
